Class MajorMinorPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Square
      • pieces.Piece

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, Knight, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class MajorMinorPiece
extends Piece
    Author:
    SebastianKoch This class extends the piece class, the classes Knight, Rook, Bishop, Queen exdent this class Its an abstract class so no Object will be created through this class
